title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-5.24 - Research
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-5.24 - Research

State Regulations
(a) All research costs shall be excluded from allowable costs in computing reimbursement rates. (b) Research includes those studies and projects which have as their purpose the enlargement of general knowledge and understanding, are experimental in nature and hold no prospect of immediate benefit to the program or its patients. Notes

86-5.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
